data:
==Commands==
*Pressing '''?''' brings up the in-game Help screen and manual. Under most circumstances, this will contain a general overview of the entire game. In certain situations, such as while casting a spell, pressing '''?''' will provide you with more specific information.

==Symbols==
While playing in console mode:
*'''?''' represents a [[scroll]].

{{alphabet}}
